oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CCRI 1951 Census of Canada: Aggregate data and geography = CCRI 1951 Recensement du Canada: Données agrégées et cadre géographique
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gaffield, Chad
Baskerville, Peter
St-Hilaire, Marc
Amrhein, Carl
Cadigan, Sean
Moldofsky, Byron
Darroch, Gordon
Bellavance, Claude
Normand, France
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study includes two components of the research infrastructure developed by CCRI for the 1951 Census of Canada: selected digitized published tables of aggregate data and a reconstruction of the census geography.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Census
Canada--Census, 1951
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: See also the CCRI Census of Canada materials for 1911, 1921, 1931 and 1941.
